name: Windows Meterpreter (Reflective Injection), Reverse HTTPS Stager with Support for Custom Proxy
author: skape <mmiller@hick.org>
sf <stephen_fewer@harmonysecurity.com>
OJ Reeves
hdm <x@hdm.io>
corelanc0d3r <peter.ve@corelan.be>
amaloteaux <alex_maloteaux@metasploit.com>
description:
Inject the Meterpreter server DLL via the Reflective Dll Injection payload (staged). Requires Windows XP SP2 or newer.

Tunnel communication over HTTP using SSL with custom proxy support
